title: [Question] Wifi password (electronic city)
content: Does anybody know pes electronic city wifi password? Seniors? Because interest doesn't work in clg and who doesn't want free wifi.

comments.body: its just the name of the network
Free WiFi ‚ùå only source of internet ‚úÖ, best of luck getting cellular data
the jio & airtel shadow ban last sem was crazy. Had to rely on the bsnl guys üò≠

USN : PES EC-CAMPUS

Password : PES EC-Campus (that's it the last part is lowercase)

You'll be redirected to the login portal, put credentials as per pesuacad website
